treatment.description: Plants annual, caulescent, sometimes subscapose. Leaf blades 1-2×-lobed, distal not clasping stem. Flowers: filaments purple, filiform. Capsules poricidal, glabrous.

references.reference: Kadereit, J. W. 1989. A revision of Papaver L. section Rhoeadium Spach. Notes Roy. Bot. Gard. Edinburgh 45: 225-286.
